column4: the sound on my laptop has stopped working; no movies, music etc. at the same time, my pc speaker has started playing over the laptop speakers. any ideas to get my sound back?
it thinks for a second than it asks for a new command
you see the volume applet open it up
it is in the right top corner
i have master, headphone, pcm, line in, cd and microphone
as a person said earlier just restart Ub..
alright, i'll come back if i still have issues
after the restart, everything appears to be wokring fine
